if.description: Structure that executes commands only if the defined condition is true. (if)

ifelse.description: Structure that evaluates the condition and executes the 'if' commands if it is true and the 'else' if it is false. (if | else)

ifelseif.description: Structure that makes possible to verify another 'if' condition, if the first one is false. (if | else if)

while.description: Loop that executes the commands until the condition be false (while)

do.description: Loop that executes the commands before checking the condition, until be false. (do while)

for.description: Loop that executes commands for a predetermined number of times. (for)
